capabilities.name: Deliver Results
capabilities.description: The role requires achieving impactful project outcomes efficiently, aligning with environmental and conservation priorities.

capabilities.name: Plan and Prioritise
capabilities.description: Planning and coordinating project activities to align with strategic conservation goals is essential.

capabilities.name: Think and Solve Problems
capabilities.description: The role involves developing practical solutions for project management within the context of environmental conservation.

capabilities.name: Demonstrate Accountability
capabilities.description: Responsible for managing budgets, contracts, and timelines effectively, adhering to policies and legislation.

capabilities.name: Communicate Effectively
capabilities.description: Requires excellent communication skills for stakeholder engagement and reporting.

capabilities.name: Work Collaboratively
capabilities.description: Collaboration with various stakeholders is crucial for delivering projects that support environmental goals.

capabilities.name: Project Management
capabilities.description: Essential for planning, coordinating, and monitoring project initiatives effectively.

skills.name: Stakeholder Engagement
skills.description: Engaging with various stakeholders to align project outcomes with conservation priorities.

skills.name: Budget and Contract Management
skills.description: Managing project budgets and contracts to ensure effective use of resources and compliance.

skills.name: Environmental Conservation Knowledge
skills.description: Understanding of environmental and conservation principles to align projects with sustainable outcomes.

generalRole.title: Environmental Project Officer
generalRole.description: This role involves managing and supporting projects within the environmental conservation sector, focusing on sustainable outcomes and protection of natural and cultural heritage.
